name: Dancing Lion
text:
May this card back keep evil out of your decks in the New Year!

Acquired from the shop during the 2022 Lunar New Year event.

name: Xuen
text:
A card back can't change its stripes. But why would it want to?

Acquired by purchasing the Hero Xuen.

name: Diao Chan
text:
This one makes the best souvenir for a true fan.

Acquired by purchasing the Hero Diao Chan Valeera.
